# Dot product scalar product

$$
\mathbf{x}\cdot \mathbf{y}=\sum_{i=1}^nx_iy_i.
$$



With R


```{r}
set.seed(123)
x<-round(rnorm(10,20,5),2)
y<-round(rnorm(10,21,6),2)
x
y
sum(x*y)
x%*%y

x
mean(x)
2*x
mean(2*x)
```
